text: Emma Cohen (born Emmanuela Beltrán Rahola; November 21, 1946 – July 11, 2016) was a Spanish actress, director, producer and writer. She appeared in many Spanish language movies. She was known for roles in The Glass Ceiling, Voyage to Nowhere, and in The Grandfather. Cohen was married to actor Fernando Fernán Gómez until his death in 2007.Rolfe, Pamela. "Spain's Fernando Fernan-Gomez dies at 86 ." The Hollywood Reporter. November 2, 2007. Retrieved on July 5, 2010. Cohen died on July 11, 2016 of cancer in Madrid at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Movie directors from Barcelona Category:Spanish movie producers Category:Spanish screenwriters Category:Actors from Barcelona Category:Writers from Barcelona
title: Emma Cohen
